tasks.text: Developing together with the Backend team a new flow to handle identification of users, and implementing the system across multiple consumer apps.
Coordinating tasks with multiple team members of different sections such as design, product, UI/UX, Backend, and DevOps.
Development focused on customer satisfaction and computer security.
Developing the new version of a frontend app for financial support and investments advice.
Helping in the process to migrate from a GraphQl integration to a REST API approach.
Following SOLID principles, and making use of tools such as ES Lint and Prettier to ensure good code quality.
Experienced fullstack developer with a strong track record of designing and implementing dynamic web applications.
My expertise lies in seamlessly integrating frontend design elements with backend functionalities, leveraging PHP's power to create dynamic, secure, and responsive websites.
Adhering to industry best practices and maintaining high coding standards.
Streamlined web development workflow by migrating from class to function components in React for the hotel's frontend team.
Enhanced data integration by creating efficient API response adapters, contributing to seamless user experiences for the hotel's web plattform.
Drove documentation efforts, ensuring clear guidelines and knowledge sharing for the frontend team at the web development team of the hotel.
